name: petridish
description: Jekyll theme for research project websites.
author: Peter Desmet

scripts.copy:fontawesome: mkdir -p assets/theme/webfonts && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts/* assets/theme/webfonts && cp node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css assets/theme/css/fontawesome-all.min.css
scripts.copy:academicons: mkdir -p assets/theme/fonts && cp -r node_modules/academicons/fonts/* assets/theme/fonts && cp node_modules/academicons/css/academicons.min.css assets/theme/css/academicons.min.css
scripts.copy:all: mkdir -p assets/theme/css && mkdir -p assets/theme/js && npm run copy:bootstrap-scss && npm run copy:fontawesome && npm run copy:academicons && npm run copy:jquery && npm run copy:anchor-js && npm run copy:popper && npm run copy:bootstrap
